Australia: Dutch explorer Willem de Vlamingh charted the southwestern coast of Australia, making a landfall at Rottnest Island and the site of the present-day city of Perth.
Russia: Ivan V died. Second Azov campaign: Russian army began its deployment to an important Ottoman fortress, Azov. Second Azov campaign: Russian navy arrived at the sea and blockaded Azov. Second Azov campaign: The Ottoman garrison surrendered.
